LiteLoader 1.7.10_04
  • Prev Package
  • Next Package
  • Frames
  • No Frames
  • All Classes

Package com.mumfrey.liteloader.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BrandingProvider
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Branding Provider The Branding Provider manages loader branding alterations for a particular API.
    CoreProvider
    LiteLoader Extensible API - API Core Provider Core Providers are objects whose lifecycle is equivalent to the run time of game and thus the entire lifecycle of your API, they are instanced early in the loader startup process.
    CustomisationProvider
    Base interface for loader customisation providers, has to be here so that we don't load branding provider classes too soon
    EnumeratorModule
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Interface for objects which can enumerate mods in places EnumeratorModules plug into the LoaderEnumerator and are used to discover mod containers in various locations, for example searching in a specific folder for particular files.
    GenericObserver<T>
    Generic Observer class, for Intra-API Observer inking
    InterfaceObserver
    Observer for interface binding events
    InterfaceProvider
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Interface Provider InterfaceProviders are able to advertise and provide Listener interfaces which can be implemented by mods or other Listener-derived classes
    Listener
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Listener is the base interface for (counter-intuitively) consumable Listener interfaces, in that derived interfaces are consumable (from the point of view of the providers) but actual implementors consume the events thus advertised by implementing those interfaces, making them themselves the consumers.
    LiteAPI
    LiteLoader Extensible API - main Mod API Implementors of this class don't really do anything except provide instances of other classes which make up the API proper.
    ModInfoDecorator
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Branding Provider Decorator for ModInfo classes, to alter the appearance of ModInfo entries in the mod list
    ModLoadObserver
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Mod Load Observer ModLoadObservers receive callbacks when mod loading events are occurring, prior to init and other loader-managed processes
    Observer
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Observer base interface Observers are essentially "core listeners" which are objects which make up the core a of a particular API implementation and sink events generated by the Loader or by other observable components.
    PostRenderObserver
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Post-render Observers PostRenderObservers receive the onPostRender event every frame, allowing "draw-on-top" behaviour for API components
    ShutdownObserver
    LiteLoader Extensible API - ShutDownObserver ShutDownObservers receive an event when the game is shutting down due to a user request.
    TickObserver
    LiteLoader Extensible API - TickObserver Received a callback every tick (duh) PRIOR to the mod tick event
    WorldObserver
    LiteLoader Extensible API - WorldObserver WorldObservers receive a callback when the Minecraft.theWorld reference changes, beware the value is allowed to be null
